name: approval-mock-restservice
description: Mock REST-Server to support Approval-Client Process

scripts.doc: api-doc-generator --title Approval REST Mock-Server --input src/server.ts --output public
scripts.start: nodemon -e ts --watch src --exec "npm run build && node dist/server.js || exit 1"
scripts.build: rm -fr dist && npm run lint && tsc --outDir dist && npm run-script doc

author: Henner Harnisch
